base_layout.translate_context: Base layout elements shared across authentication pages

mfa_sms_page.heading: Otantifye pa SMS
mfa_sms_page.description: Mete yon nimewo telefòn pou resevwa kòd yo pa sms
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_help_text: Kite l san w pa mete 0
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_error_invalid_region: Nimewo a pa valid pou rejyon sa
mfa_sms_page.phone_input_error_invalid_format: Antre chif sèlman san mete espas, eksepte pou 0 inisyal
mfa_sms_page.translate_context: Page for setting up multi-factor authentication using SMS

index.heading: Byenvini nan ${business_name}
index.description: Pa gen anyen la pou kounya. Men gen yon bèl paj akèy kap vini nan pa lontan.
index.translate_context: Landing page after login when no content is available yet

sign_in_page.heading: Bon retou
sign_in_page.description: Antre imèl ou e n ap voye yon kòd pou w ka konekte.
sign_in_page.email_input_error_invitation_mismatch: Imèl la dwe menm ak sa yo your invitation was sent to
sign_in_page.email_input_error_no_account_found: Nou pa jwenn kont pou imèl sa
sign_in_page.auth_form_error_no_auth_methods_enabled: Dezole, nou pa jwenn yon fason pou nou otantifye w pou moman.
sign_in_page.translate_context: Page where people enter their email to sign in to an existing Kinde account

sign_up_page.heading: Kreye yon kont
sign_up_page.description: Se yon plezi pou nou genyenw la
sign_up_page.invitation_description: Ou envite pou rejwenn ${business_name}. Silvouplè konekte oubyen anrejistre pou aksepte envitasyon an.
sign_up_page.email_input_error_invitation_mismatch: Imèl la dwe menm ak sa yo te voye envitasyon an
sign_up_page.disclaimer: Depi w kontinye, ou dakò ak politik nou yo
sign_up_page.disclaimer_clickwrap_error_required: Ou dwe li e aksepte politik nou yo pou kontinye
sign_up_page.disclaimer_dialog_description: Pou kontinye ak koneksyon an, nou bezwen ou li epi aksepte politik nou yo
sign_up_page.auth_form_error_terms_not_accepted: Ou dwe li e aksepte politik nou yo pou kontinye
sign_up_page.auth_form_error_no_auth_methods_enabled: Dezole, nou pa jwenn yon fason pou nou otantifye w pou moman.
sign_up_page.translate_context: Page for creating a new Kinde account

choose_mfa_method_page.heading: Verifye idantite w
choose_mfa_method_page.translate_context: Page to choose a preferred MFA method

account_locked_page.heading: Kont bloke
account_locked_page.description: Ou antre yon move kòd twòp fwa e kont ou a bloke pou ${lockout_duration_minutes} minit
account_locked_page.translate_context: Page shown when a user is locked out due to too many failed attempts

password_setup_page.heading: Kreye modpas
password_setup_page.password_input_error_too_common: Modpas sa twò komen. Fè l pou li pa fasil pou moun devine.
password_setup_page.password_input_error_too_short: Modpas la dwe pou pi piti 8 karaktè
password_setup_page.password_input_error_extra_space: Yon modpas paka ni kòmanse ni fini pa yon espas
password_setup_page.translate_context: Page for setting up a new password

password_reset_page.heading: Kreye modpas
password_reset_page.password_input_error_too_common: Modpas sa twò komen. Fè l pou li pa fasil pou moun devine.
password_reset_page.password_input_error_too_short: Modpas la dwe pou pi piti 8 karaktè
password_reset_page.password_input_error_extra_space: Yon modpas paka ni kòmanse ni fini pa yon espas
password_reset_page.translate_context: Page for resetting an existing password

recovery_codes_page.heading: Ou preske fini
recovery_codes_page.description: Kopye kòd rekouvreman sa yo epi sere yo yon kote ki sekirize. W ap bezwen yo si yon fwa ou ta bezwen konekte san aparèy ou a.
recovery_codes_page.recovery_codes_page_error_already_viewed: Sanble ou te wè kòd rekouvreman yon fwa deja, kidonk nou paka montre yo ankò. Si w bezwen èd pou w konekte, kontakte administratè kont ou a.
recovery_codes_page.translate_context: Page to display and download recovery codes

subscribe_form_widget.heading: Rete nan sèk la
subscribe_form_widget.description: Rete enfòme de nou sou nouvèl, mizajou ak evenman
subscribe_form_widget.translate_context: Widget form to subscribe to updates and news

password_verify_page.heading: Antre modpas ou a
password_verify_page.password_input_error_incorrect: Silvouplè bay yon modpas ki valid
password_verify_page.password_input_error_too_short: Modpas yo dwe 8 karaktè pou pi piti
password_verify_page.translate_context: Page to verify password after email is entered

sms_verify_code_page.heading: Verifye nimewo telefòn
sms_verify_code_page.description: Antre kòd nou fèk voye sou ${phone_number}
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Kòd konfimasyon ou a ekspire, silvouplè remande yon nouvo
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Silvouplè antre yon kòd konfimasyon ki valid
sms_verify_code_page.code_input_error_resend_requested_too_so: Poko ka voye yon lòt kòd pou kounya. Tanpri eseye ankò pita
sms_verify_code_page.description_warning_too_many_incorrect_a: Twòp kòd enkòrèk te itilize kidonk nou voye yon lòt sou ${phone_number}
sms_verify_code_page.description_resent_code: Nou fèk voye yon nouvo kòd sou ${phone_number}
sms_verify_code_page.translate_context: Page to verify SMS-based confirmation code

mfa_use_phone_otp_page.heading: Verifye nimewo telefòn
mfa_use_phone_otp_page.description: Antre kòd nou fèk voye sou ${phone_number}
mfa_use_phone_otp_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Kòd konfimasyon ou a ekspire, silvouplè remande yon nouvo

recovery_code_verify_page.heading: Kòd rekouvreman
recovery_code_verify_page.description: antre youn nan kòd rekouvreman ou te bay yo lè w tap anrejistre a.
recovery_code_verify_page.recovery_code_input_error_unknown_error: Gen pwoblèm otantifikasyon ak kòd rekouvreman sa
recovery_code_verify_page.recovery_code_input_error_too_short: Antre yon kòd rekouvreman ki gen 9 karaktè pou pi piti
recovery_code_verify_page.translate_context: Page to enter a recovery code for MFA fallback

verification_code_sms.description:
${generated_code} se kòd a izaj inik ou a pou konekte sou ${business_name}

@${receiver_domain} #${generated_code}
verification_code_sms.translate_context: SMS message content template for sending verification code

choose_organization_page.heading: Ki kote ou vle konekte?
choose_organization_page.translate_context: Page for selecting an organization to sign in to

request_access_page.heading: N ap kenbe w enfòme e voye yon envitasyon lè aksè a disponib
request_access_page.description: N ap kenbe w enfòme e n ap fè w konnen lè envitasyon ou an pare
request_access_page.success_heading: Mèsi dèske w mande aksè. Nou ajoute w nan lis nou an e n ap voye mizajou nan pa lontan.
request_access_page.success_description: Mèsi dèske w mande aksè a ${business_name}. Nou ajoute w nan lis abone nou yo e na p fè w konnen nan pa lontan kilè yon envitasyon ap disponib.

authenticator_app_manual_page.heading: App otantifikasyon
authenticator_app_manual_page.description: Antre kòd sa nan app otantifikasyon prefere w la. Epi antre kòd a izaj inik ou resevwa anba la.
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_required: Silvouplè antre yon kòd verifikasyon ki valid
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Kòd konfimasyon ou a ekspire, silvouplè remande yon nouvo
authenticator_app_manual_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Silvouplè antre yon kòd konfimasyon ki valid
authenticator_app_manual_page.translate_context: Page to manually set up MFA using an authenticator app

authenticator_app_qr_code_page.heading: App otantifikasyon
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.description: Eskane Kòd QR ki anba pandanw ap itilize aplikasyon otantifikasyon prefere w la . Antre kòd a izaj inik ou resevwa anba.
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_required: Silvouplè antre yon kòd verifikasyon ki valid
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Kòd konfimasyon ou a ekspire, silvouplè remande yon nouvo
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Silvouplè antre yon kòd konfimasyon ki valid
authenticator_app_qr_code_page.translate_context: Page for scanning a QR code to set up MFA with an authenticator app

authenticator_app_verify_code_page.heading: App otantifikasyon
authenticator_app_verify_code_page.description: Ouvri aplikasyon ou ki verifye akò a ak antre kòd la anba a
authenticator_app_verify_code_page.code_input_error_required: Silvouplè antre yon kòd verifikasyon ki valid
authenticator_app_verify_code_page.code_input_error_expired_code: Kòd konfimasyon ou a ekspire, silvouplè remande yon nouvo
authenticator_app_verify_code_page.code_input_error_incorrect_code: Silvouplè antre yon kòd konfimasyon ki valid
authenticator_app_verify_code_page.translate_context: Page to verify code from the authenticator app

email_address_verification_email.email_body:
Ey sakapfèt,
Silvouplè itilize kòd ki anba pou konfime adrès imèl ou epi kontinye sou ${business_name}. Kòd sa ap ekspire nan 2 zèd tan. Si w pa panse w te dwe resevwa imèl sa, ou ka inyore l san pwoblèm.
email_address_verification_email.email_preview: Silvouplè itilize kòd ki anba pou konfime adrès imèl ou epi kontinye sou ${business_name}
email_address_verification_email.email_disclaimer: Ou resevwa imèl sa paske ou fè yon rekèt kòd konfimasyon de ${business_name}
email_address_verification_email.translate_context: Email template for sending verification code

continue_with_sso_page.heading: Kontinye ak SSO
continue_with_sso_page.description: Administratè ou a pèmèt SSO. Sèvi ak imèl travay ou pou jwenn aksè nan kont ou.
continue_with_sso_page.email_input_error_invitation_mismatch: Imèl la dwe matche ak sa ki voye envitasyon an
continue_with_sso_page.email_input_error_saml_sso: Domèn sa a pa konfigire pou itilize SAML SSO
continue_with_sso_page.email_input_error_no_account_found: Pa gen kont ki jwenn ak imèl sa a
continue_with_sso_page.translate_context: Page to continue login via Single Sign-On (SSO)

clickwrap_page.heading: Pwochen etap
clickwrap_page.description: Pou kontinye, nou bezwen ou li ak aksepte politik nou yo.
clickwrap_page.disclaimer_clickwrap_error_required: Ou dwe li ak aksepte politik yo pou kontinye
clickwrap_page.translate_context: Page to accept policies before completing sign-up

provide_email_page.heading: Nou bezwen imèl ou tou
provide_email_page.description: Avèk yon imèl, nou ka verifye idantite ou epi kontakte ou sou kont ou.
provide_email_page.translate_context: Page to collect user's email for identification and communication

mfa_email_page.translate_context: Page for setting up multi-factor authentication using email

account_not_found_page.translate_context: Page shown when no account is found during sign-in

phone_number_component.translate_context: Component handling phone number input and errors

username_component.translate_context: Component handling username or email input and validation

choose_plan_page.translate_context: Page to select a subscription plan

subscription_success_page.translate_context: Page shown after a successful subscription

collect_payment_details_page.translate_context: Page to collect the payment details for a new subscrition signup
